Green_Bay.University of Wisconsin\u2013Green Bay:
The University of Wisconsin–Green Bay (also known as UW–Green Bay or UWGB) is a public university located in Green Bay, Wisconsin, United States. Founded in 1965, it is part of the University of Wisconsin System.
Since its founding, the school had an environmental sustainability emphasis (nicknamed "Eco U" in the 1970s by Newsweek), and offers associate's, bachelor's and master's degree programs.
